While running the mylar monitor tests, I occasionally saw exceptions like the following:

    Exception in thread "Timer-0" java.lang.NullPointerException
            at org.eclipse.mylar.provisional.tasklist.MylarTaskListPlugin.getMylarCorePrefs(MylarTaskListPlugin.java:504)
            at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.tasklist.TaskListBackupManager$CheckBackupRequired.run(TaskListBackupManager.java:155)
            at java.util.TimerThread.mainLoop(Unknown Source)
            at java.util.TimerThread.run(Unknown Source)

The tests would have completed with no problems, leading me to believe this is occuring during the workbench shutdown.  I put a test for Platform.isRunning() in the run() method and haven't seen this error since.  Patch follows.

Created an attachment (id=41820)
Check that the platform is running
